Click on the links below to download data files used during the course.

```{r, results='asis'}
dir <- "data/"
list.files(dir) %>%
  sort %>% 
  grep("\\.html$ | *.zip", ., value=TRUE, invert=TRUE) %>% 
  paste0("- [", ., "](", paste0(dir, .), ")") %>% 
  cat(sep="\n")
```
